sefaria_key: Rabbi Abba b. Hiyya b. Abba

comments: on basis of Jewish encyclopedia link that lists traversing fellow as 4 & 5th gen, and Bonayich that lists as Eretz Yisrael and Bavel intermittently

disconnect here, because there is also אלעזר הקפר ברבי, #486, and Bonayich wants to assign the famous Bar Kappara to this one instead, so a 2 to 1 assignment, while Rabbo Eliezer HaKappar above should be the father, #485
Why is he marked as 1st gen Tanna, rather than first gen Zug?
